metadata.subject: Trump's ex-lawyer Michael Cohen will testify at House Oversight Committee before entering prison

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022

relationships.description: Kahn is sending Epstein news about Michael Cohen's testimony
Cohen will testify before the House Oversight Committee

analysis.purpose: To share news about Michael Cohen's upcoming testimony before the House Oversight Committee
analysis.significance: Shows communication about significant political/legal developments involving Trump's former lawyer

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - simply sharing news article

illegal_activity.description: This is shared news content about Michael Cohen's legal proceedings, not first-hand illegal activity

details: CNBC news article about Michael Cohen's testimony

public_knowledge.context: Michael Cohen's testimony was widely covered in media as part of investigations into Trump administration

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a CNBC news article about Michael Cohen's upcoming testimony before the House Oversight Committee prior to Cohen entering prison, sharing publicly available news information.
